description: This file defines a UI component (Fragment) responsible for displaying full details of a note, including title and content, and providing options to edit or delete the note. It interacts with a repository class for data retrieval and deletion, and uses Android navigation components for screen transitions.

classes.name: NoteDetailsFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that shows the full details of a note, with options to edit or delete it.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment's UI.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, retrieves the note by ID, and sets up button click listeners for editing and deleting the note.
